sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.change_management.cab" name="Change Management - CAB Workbench" version="1.0.0" state="published" help="CSHelp:Change-Management-CAB-Workbench" provider_name="ServiceNow" onload_demo_data="create_demo_meeting_records.js" invalidate_properties="true" licensable="true" scope_name="sn_change_cab" scope_sys_id="18351d53eb32120034d1eeea1206fe79"> <description>CAB Workbench</description> <requires> <import plugin="com.snc.change_management.cab.form_layout"/> <import plugin="com.snc.app.calendar"/> <import plugin="com.glide.service-portal"/> <import plugin="com.glide.editor.tinymce"/> </requires> </plugin>]]></definition> <description>CAB Workbench</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:Change-Management-CAB-Workbench</help> <id>com.snc.change_management.cab</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Change Management - CAB Workbench</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.change_management.cab/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.change_management.cab.form_layout,com.snc.app.calendar,com.glide.service-portal,com.glide.editor.tinymce</requires> <scope>sn_change_cab</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.change_management.cab</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
